message.body: Gabi I'm stressing about all the spelling errors and the name thing but I don't want to upset anyone because I can see how much work it was. I think Phinn is going to die that his name is misspelled. We can't do anything right?
I sent spelling corrections to all of those last night! I just messaged lois about it again too
I'm kind of freaking. I hate all this rushing and with spelling errors it looks so unprofessional. And OMG Phinns name spelled wrong that will kill him
Did she send it to the printer? She hasnt responded yet?
I don't know. I'm at work are you? If not can you call her?
Im at work for another hour too
Its too late! Theyre already printing them. I liked it in red and now it looks like a green mountain cabaret poster
We'll have to compensate with an amazing show. I'm a little upset we had no chance to give feedback and it wasn't proof read! Hopefully Phinn won't die
I think maybe what we saw was not the final draft, she said today in an email that she took the names off
They're on because she just asked me to email the cast explaining why they're on
And what do we say to that? I asked richard's opinion when lois first brought up names on the poster, he didnt think the cast would be offended by it
Good. I'm trying to let it go.
